title: Podcast Setup Checklist
description: Assistance and resources provided to start a podcast
summary: The user seeks help in starting a podcast, and the assistant breaks down the request into UI blocks. Three sets of suggestions are given, each containing a checklist for podcast setup steps and a resource card with recommended tools such as Audacity, Anchor, and Canva. The goal is to guide the user in defining their podcast concept, selecting equipment, creating artwork, choosing a hosting platform, recording episodes, and planning promotion strategies.
